title: ASCE 7-22 Wind Load Calculator (Main Wind-Force Resisting System)

formulas.title: Formula (extracted LaTeX)
formulas.latex: q_z = 0.00256 \; K_z \, K_{zt} \, K_d \, V^2 \, I \quad [\mathrm{psf}]
formulas.raw: q_z = 0.00256 \; K_z \, K_{zt} \, K_d \, V^2 \, I \quad [\mathrm{psf}]

formulas.title: Formula (extracted LaTeX)
formulas.latex: p = q_z \, G \, C_p \;-\; q_i \, (GC_{pi}), \quad \text{with } q_i \approx q_h
formulas.raw: p = q_z \, G \, C_p \;-\; q_i \, (GC_{pi}), \quad \text{with } q_i \approx q_h

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Velocity pressure: $$ q_z = 0.00256 \; K_z \, K_{zt} \, K_d \, V^2 \, I \quad [\mathrm{psf}] $$ Exposure coefficient (power law): $$ K_z = 2.01 \left(\frac{z}{z_g}\right)^{\frac{2}{\alpha}}, \quad 15\,\mathrm{ft} \le z \le z_g $$ where for Exposure B: (z_g=1200\,ft, \alpha=7), Exposure C: (z_g=900\,ft, \alpha=9.5), Exposure D: (z_g=700\,ft, \alpha=11.5). Clamp z to [15 ft, z_g]. Design pressure (MWFRS, surface/zone): $$ p = q_z \, G \, C_p \;-\; q_i \, (GC_{pi}), \quad \text{with } q_i \approx q_h $$

changes: Initial audit spec draft generated from HTML extraction (review required).
